articles.title: Nearly 1 in 5 adults who had COVID have lingering symptoms - U.S. study - Reuters
articles.description: Nearly 1 in 5 American adults who reported having COVID-19 in the past are still having symptoms of long COVID, according to survey data collected in the first two weeks of June, U.S. health officials said on Wednesday.
articles.content: June 22 (Reuters) - Nearly 1 in 5 American adults who reported having COVID-19 in the past are still having symptoms of long COVID, according to survey data collected in the first two weeks of June, … [+1553 chars]

articles.title: Polio Found in London Sewage, But Risk of Infection Considered Low - Voice of America - VOA News
articles.description: Discovery is sign since 1980s that virus could be spreading in Britain, but no cases have been found
articles.content: LONDON  Polio has been detected in sewage samples in the British capital, the first sign since the 1980s that the virus could be spreading in the country, but no cases have been found, authorities sa… [+2545 chars]

articles.author: Bailey Schulz and Zach Wichter, USA TODAY
articles.title: American Airlines will end service to four cities in September citing pilot shortage - USA TODAY
articles.description: American Airlines will stop flying to Islip and Ithaca, New York; Toledo, Ohio; and Dubuque, Iowa, citing a lack of pilots
articles.content:
American Airlines will cut service to four cities because of a pilot shortage.
As of Sept. 7, the airline will no longer serve Islip or Ithaca in New York; Toledo, Ohio; or Dubuque, Iowa. 
All four… [+3065 chars]
